text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in KLGenerelInformationFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in KLSygeplejeOmråderFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in KLHjemmeplejeOmråderFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in KLTræningOmråderFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in KLForebyggelseOmråderFSIII
  • Import all the codes that are contained in KLTemaerFFB

name: KLInformationCodes
title: KLOplysningKoder
description: Information codes from FSIII and FFB (Område, Tema, Generelle oplysninger)
